title: Cant install league!
body: The game keeps getting stuck at 33 percent. I've tried uninstalling it, and reinstalling it, disabling peer to peer, restarting and more things but it wont download

replies.body:
At 33% and onward during the patching process, the patcher is downloading files and applying them. Usually, any issues at this point are caused by an unstable connection to the patching servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped out.
try uninstalling the client and install from scratch but make sure to manuallyh delete the folder
